text: @SpeakerPelosi Translation: Nothing is more important than exploiting the pandemic to advance the Democrats' vision for America. It's why I'm obsessed with keeping fear and panic going as long as possible. It's also why I have zero interest in establishing an effective treatment for COVID19.
